page.title: 07UPWOOD CHURCH(PART 1)
page.content:
If you look up where the{arches}are you will see where the old windows used to be.In Upwood church the windows are nearly all plain glass with wire through.Outside in the graveyard there is a broken old wall. The wall is supposed to be the{plague wall.people who caught the plague were buried behind the wall.In the church there is a little bit of stained glass on two windows.One of the windows is beside Jesus's Cross.About 100 years ago a priest stole the silver cup and plate and sold them.The priest disappeared and was never heard of again.He was probably killed.
BY Kathryn and Sarah.
